raw: Texas governor reopens more businesses and schools days after highest jump in Covid-19 cases in the state .
replaced: Texas  Texas governor reopens more businesses and schools days after highest jump in Covid-19 cases in Texas .

raw: Child care centers , office buildings , youth clubs and massage and personal - care centers may open immediately , Abbott said at a news conference Monday .
replaced: Child care centers , office buildings , youth clubs and massage and personal - care centers may open immediately , Abbott said at a news conference Monday .

raw: At the end of the week , on May 22 , restaurants will be allowed to increase capacity to 50 % , from 25 % now .

raw: Bars , wine tasting rooms and craft breweries can open at a 25 % capacity , the governor said .
replaced: Bars , wine tasting rooms and craft breweries can open at a 25 % capacity , Texas governor said .

raw: Those capacity limits do not apply to outdoor areas that maintain safe distances , Abbott said .
replaced: Those capacity limits do not apply to outdoor areas that maintain safe distances , Abbott said .

raw: " Today , tomorrow and every day going forward is one day closer to medical discoveries that will help treat and protect people from getting Covid-19 , " Abbott said .
replaced: " Today , tomorrow and that day is one day closer to medical discoveries that will help treat and protect people from getting Covid-19 , " Abbott said .

raw: " Until that day comes , our focus is to keep you safe while also restoring your ability to get back to work , to open your businesses , to pay your bills , to put food on your tables . "
replaced: " Until that day comes , our focus is to keep you safe while also restoring your ability to get back to work , to open your businesses , to pay your bills , to put food on your tables . "

raw: Texas , one of the first states to reopen , on Saturday saw its highest single - day increase in positive Covid-19 cases yet , 1,801 , according to the Texas Department of State Health Services .
replaced: Texas saw Texas highest single - day increase in positive Covid-19 cases yet , 1,801 , according to the Department of State Health Services .

raw: At the news conference Monday , Abbott attributed the spike to increased testing .

raw: The percentage of positive tests has gone down , he said .
replaced: The percentage of positive tests has gone down , Abbott said .

raw: Dallas Mayor Eric Johnson , though , attributed the rising numbers at least in part to the state 's reopening of businesses .

raw: " Well , more than likely what you saw in the cases jumping in the past few days that we 've reported is a change in policy with respect to the reopening of parts of our economy , a couple weeks ago , " the mayor told CNN 's Alisyn Camerota on " New Day " on Monday .

raw: More businesses , camps and schools may open soon The state reported just 11 new deaths from Covid-19 on Monday , the lowest new daily death toll since March 31 , when the state had only four fatalities , according to the health department 's data .

replaced: Various businesses including bowling alleys , bingo halls and skating rinks , as well as rodeos and aquariums may also all open at 25 % capacity on May 8 , Abbott said .
